]]>falsefalsex_089_lms.book_returnedfalsefalsefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1falseHi: ${assigned_to.first_name}

 

We have recorded the return of ${book.title} for loan ${number} on return: ${closed_at}.

 

Thank you

ServiceNow Library

]]>Book return confirmationfalse100falseassigned_totrue
